metadata.title: CVE-2014-5191 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Preview plugin before 4.4.3in CKEditor allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTMLvia unspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: ckeditor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
